label: 3D Contour Plot

branding.tagline: Interactive 3D surface and contour plots for Looker.

vis_label.label: Visualization Label
vis_label.description: This label will appear in the visualization selector in the Looker Explore UI.

vis_id.label: Visualization Id
vis_id.description: This must be a unique ID across all visualizations.

description: A Looker custom visualization to render interactive 3D contour and surface plots using Plotly.js.
